title: My English score was below 5 marks most of the time. How do I improve a good mark in this section for bank exams? - Quora

response.answer_text: As far as the english for competitive examination is concerned. It is the most important section of the examination nowadays. There is no option you can skip this section and qualify the exam so you need to be very determined to improve your english. You need a proper strategy to make you english efficient for examination. The best way of improvement is reading habit you must have a reading habit it can improve your vocabulary as well as the comprehension. you can follow daily newspaper any english newspaper but I'll suggest you should go for the Hindu at the beginning it will difficult but after some times you become used to this and you will started enjoying newspaper. Secondly you should watch english movies with subtitles. It also helps a lot in comprehension. If you're preparing for banking don't forget to complete each and every question of previous year. Do more than three times you'll get good results. Previous year questions are the most important in order to score good in english section. After completing all this you can attempt online mocks and practice online vocabulary on mobile application which will help you to remain your vocabulary updated. Thank You
